book.synopsis: A novella and short stories, representing work by the acclaimed Columbian author from the period when he explored the world of Macondo, reveal his imaginative and technical exuberance and mastery.
book.title_long: La Increible y Triste Historia de la Candida Erendir y de Su Abuela Desalmada (Spanish Edition)
